summary: SEVERAL TIMES WHEN LIGHTS WERE ON AT NIGHT ALL OF THE GAUGES AND LIGHTS WOULD GO OFF FOR A FEW SECONDS AND THEM COME BACK ON WITH ALL  OF THE GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS COME ON AND STAY ON FOR A MINUTE OR TWO THEN RESET THERE SELF . ONE TIME ALL POWER WAS LOST FOR A FEW SECONDS AND THEN BACK ON.  HAD TO DEALER, THEY HAD NO IDEA, NO CODES SHOWED
